participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Maya is creative and introspective, often finding joy in the arts and literature. She tends to be straightforward and has a pragmatic approach to life.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i don't care about fashion.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: George is adventurous and wise, with a passion for learning and exploration. He enjoys sharing stories from his travels and has a friendly demeanor.
participant_2.background: i think i will retire in a few years. i really like to travel. i have visited spain a times. i am a librarian. i'm 60years old.

content.text: What will u do after retirement?
